description.name: Long HSS M2 7.0mm black & gold metal twist drill bit
description.long_desc:
Wiertło do metalu przedłużane złoto-czarne wykonane ze stali szybkotnącej M2 HSS, pokryte powłoką TiN (azotek tytanu). Wiertło zgodne z normą DIN 340. Uchwyt cylindryczny.

Wiertło przeznaczone do wykonywania otworów przelotowy oraz nieprzelotowych. Posiadają dwa centralne ostrza szlifowane pod kątem 135° oraz rowki które skutecznie odprowadzają wiór w górę otworu.

Wiertło pokryte warstwą TiN przeznaczone jest w szczególności do obróbki materiałów trudnoskrawalnych. Zastosowanie powłoki TiN skutkuje wzrostem twardości wiertła, umożliwia przyspieszenie procesu skrawania oraz pozwala uzyskać lepszą jakość obrabianych elementów. Warstwa azotku tytanu dzięki redukcji siły tarcia zmniejsza zużycie ostra, a co za tym idzie wydłuża żywotność wiertła.

Wiertło zapakowano w blister z otworem do zawieszenia na haku.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • wiertło wykonane ze stali szybkotnącej HHS M2

  • wiertło przedłużane zgodne z normą DIN 340

  • pokryte powłoką TiN (azotek tytanu)

  • bardzo dobre odprowadzanie urobku dzięki szlifowanej spirali

  • 2-stopniowy wierzchołek szlifowany pod kątem 135°

  • perfekcyjnie szlifowana krawędź tnąca

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Stal: HSS M2

Powłoka: TiN

Rozmiar: 7,00 mm

Długość całkowita: 156 mm

Długość robocza: 102 mm

Wierzchołek: 2-stopniowy, szlifowany pod kątem 135°

Uchwyt: cylindryczny

description.name: 13pcs HSS 2.0-8.0mm black & gold metal twist drill bit set
description.long_desc:
Zestaw 13szt. wierteł do metalu złoto-czarnych wykonanych ze stali szybkotnącej 4341 HSS, pokryte powłoką TiN (azotek tytanu). Wiertła zgodne z normą DIN 338. Uchwyt cylindryczny.

Wiertła przeznaczone do wykonywania otworów przelotowy oraz nieprzelotowych. Posiadają dwa centralne ostrza szlifowane pod kątem 135° oraz rowki które skutecznie odprowadzają wiór w górę otworu.

Wiertła pokryte warstwą TiN przeznaczone jest w szczególności do obróbki materiałów trudnoskrawalnych. Zastosowanie powłoki TiN skutkuje wzrostem twardości wierteł, umożliwia przyspieszenie procesu skrawania oraz pozwala uzyskać lepszą jakość obrabianych elementów. Warstwa azotku tytanu dzięki redukcji siły tarcia zmniejsza zużycie ostra, a co za tym idzie wydłuża żywotność wierteł.

Wiertła zapakowane w wygodne do przechowywania pudełko z tworzywa.

description.short_desc:
Zestaw 13szt. wierteł do metalu złoto-czarnych wykonanych ze stali szybkotnącej 4341 HSS, pokryte powłoką TiN (azotek tytanu). Wiertła zgodne z normą DIN 338. Uchwyt cylindryczny.

Wiertła przeznaczone do wykonywania otworów przelotowy oraz nieprzelotowych. Posiadają dwa centralne ostrza szlifowane pod kątem 135° oraz rowki które skutecznie odprowadzają wiór w górę otworu.

Wiertła pokryte warstwą TiN przeznaczone jest w szczególności do obróbki materiałów trudnoskrawalnych. Zastosowanie powłoki TiN skutkuje wzrostem twardości wierteł, umożliwia przyspieszenie procesu skrawania oraz pozwala uzyskać lepszą jakość obrabianych elementów. Warstwa azotku tytanu dzięki redukcji siły tarcia zmniejsza zużycie ostra, a co za tym idzie wydłuża żywotność wierteł.

Wiertła zapakowane w wygodne do przechowywania pudełko z tworzywa.

description.name: Shallow-suction clean water pump 550W
description.long_desc:
The 550W Float Switch Submersible Pump for Clean Water is a reliable tool that ensures exceptional efficiency and versatility in the field of pumping. Its lightweight design, only 4 kg, makes it a practical and user-friendly solution that can be easily transported and adapted for various applications. This combination of lightness and power guarantees effective water pumping even in hard-to-reach places.


The pump boasts a substantial power of 550W and an impressive capacity of up to 6000L/h, making it an ideal choice for quickly removing water from different areas. The polypropylene casing not only ensures durability but also corrosion and damage resistance, translating into prolonged use without concerns about performance loss. The maximum submersion depth is 7 meters, and the presence of a float switch enables automatic control of the pump based on the water level. Additionally, the ability to pump water from a level as low as 8-10 cm above the bottom means the pump is effective even with minimal water quantities.


The submersible pump finds wide application in various situations. It can be used for emptying tanks, pools, wells, or other places where fast and efficient water removal is necessary. With a cable length of 10 meters, the pump offers flexibility in placement and operation. Reliability, performance, and the incorporated innovative features make this submersible pump an essential tool for anyone seeking a professional and effective solution for clean water pumping.


Technical Specifications:



  • Power Supply: 230V / 50Hz

  • Power: 550W

  • Capacity: 6000l / h

  • Operating Mode: Automatic

  • Motor Type: Electric

  • Switch Type: Float switch

  • Maximum Submersion Depth: 7m

  • Maximum Lift Height: 7m

  • Pump Outlet: 1", 1-1/4", 1-1/2"

  • Cable Length: 10m

  • Included: Pump, universal discharge spout, user manual

  • Pump Width: 24cm (including spout)

  • Pump Height: 30cm

description.name: Submersible pump for dirty water 900W (float switch)
description.long_desc:
The presented submersible pump with a float for dirty water, boasting a power of 900W, is a reliable solution that fully meets the requirements of users seeking an efficient and effective method of water drainage. Its significant power output of 900W ensures exceptional efficiency in water pumping, enabling smooth and fast operation even in challenging conditions. The maximum water pumping capacity of 14000 liters per hour allows for effective removal of water from various types of water reservoirs.


This submersible pump is equipped with a functional float that automatically turns the pump on and off based on the water level. With a maximum submersion depth of 7 meters, the pump is effective in draining water from deep reservoirs, wells, and more. The 10-meter cable provides flexibility in placing the pump, even in hard-to-reach locations.


The pump features connection options of 1", 1-1/4", and 1-1/2", ensuring compatibility with different types of pipes, which increases its versatility. This pump is perfect for removing water from basements, wells, retention tanks, ponds, and more. Thanks to its reliability, high power, and performance, this submersible pump is ideal for everyday use, ensuring effective water removal in various situations.


Product Features:



  • Submersible pump with high power and high performance

  • Blue-black pump design

  • Submersion depth of up to 7 meters

  • Long cable for easy placement


Technical Specifications:



  • Model: Q1DP-900N1

  • Power: 900W

  • Voltage: 230V~50Hz

  • High capacity: 14000l/h

  • Pump type: submersible pump for dirty water

  • Connection diameter: 1", 1-1/4", 1-1/2"

  • Float control for pump operation based on water level

  • Maximum submersion depth: 7m

  • Maximum water lifting height: 9m

  • Weight: 5kg

  • Material: structural plastic

  • Power cord length: 10m

  • Waterproof class: IP X8

description.description:
The presented submersible pump with a float for dirty water, boasting a power of 900W, is a reliable solution that fully meets the requirements of users seeking an efficient and effective method of water drainage. Its significant power output of 900W ensures exceptional efficiency in water pumping, enabling smooth and fast operation even in challenging conditions. The maximum water pumping capacity of 14000 liters per hour allows for effective removal of water from various types of water reservoirs.


This submersible pump is equipped with a functional float that automatically turns the pump on and off based on the water level. With a maximum submersion depth of 7 meters, the pump is effective in draining water from deep reservoirs, wells, and more. The 10-meter cable provides flexibility in placing the pump, even in hard-to-reach locations.


The pump features connection options of 1", 1-1/4", and 1-1/2", ensuring compatibility with different types of pipes, which increases its versatility. This pump is perfect for removing water from basements, wells, retention tanks, ponds, and more. Thanks to its reliability, high power, and performance, this submersible pump is ideal for everyday use, ensuring effective water removal in various situations.


Product Features:



  • Submersible pump with high power and high performance

  • Blue-black pump design

  • Submersion depth of up to 7 meters

  • Long cable for easy placement


Technical Specifications:



  • Model: Q1DP-900N1

  • Power: 900W

  • Voltage: 230V~50Hz

  • High capacity: 14000l/h

description.long_desc:
A 2-inch, 20-meter canvas hose, commonly known as a highly durable fireman's hose, with an impressive working pressure of up to 8 bars!


Geko's canvas hose provides 20 meters of tight channel for pumped water.


This hose is perfect for agricultural and household use. It can be used for pumping clean water from sources like lakes or rivers, for emptying septic tanks and sewage, and for extinguishing fires.

  • High resistance to temperature and mechanical damage

  • Capable of pumping septic tanks, sewage, both dirty and clean water

  • Compatible with electric and gas pumps

  • Resistance to creasing

description.name: Machinist Hammer 800g with Fiberglass TPR Handle GEKO Premium
description.long_desc:
The 800g Geko Premium fiberglass engineer's hammer is a tool of the highest quality that will meet the expectations of even the most demanding professionals. Its head, made from wear-resistant steel, guarantees durability and reliability in prolonged use. Regardless of the intensity of work, this hammer will maintain its excellent form, providing precise and effective strikes during various locksmith and assembly tasks.


The innovative handle made of fiberglass heralds a revolution in tool work. This lightweight yet incredibly durable material ensures excellent hammer balance, translating into precise strikes and minimizing fatigue during extended tasks. The ergonomic, anti-slip grip allows for a secure hold, increasing control over the tool and reducing the risk of slipping from the hand. Additionally, the perfect balance of the hammer directs energy to where it's needed, making every strike efficient.


The 800g Geko Premium hammer is indispensable in many situations. It excels in locksmith, assembly, and construction work where precise strikes and tool durability are crucial. It can be used for nail driving, shaping materials, and tasks requiring more striking force. Thanks to its design and exceptional features, the Geko Premium hammer enables efficient work without sacrificing comfort, making it an invaluable tool for professionals aiming to achieve outstanding results.


Product Characteristics:



  • Made from wear-resistant steel and fiberglass

  • Ergonomic and perfectly balanced

  • Ideal for locksmith, assembly, and construction work, as well as everyday DIY tasks

  • Anti-slip grip Technical Specifications:

  • Weight: 800g

  • Hammer head material: Wear-resistant steel

  • Handle material: Fiberglass

description.name: Machinist Hammer 800g with Hardwood Handle GEKO Premium
description.long_desc:
The 800g Engineer's Hammer with a strap is an essential tool for professional craftsmen and DIY enthusiasts seeking reliability and efficiency with every strike. The head of this hammer, made from high-quality high-carbon steel, ensures not only durability but also excellent performance during repair and construction work. This hammer has been designed with precision and force in mind, allowing for maximum results with minimal effort.


The handle of the hammer, made from carefully selected wood, guarantees a comfortable and secure grip, which is crucial during precise strikes. The ergonomic shape of the handle makes work more comfortable, and control over the strikes is excellent. Regardless of the application and intensity of use, this hammer will undoubtedly meet expectations in terms of durability and effectiveness, remaining a dependable companion in the workshop or on the construction site.


The 800g Engineer's Hammer with a strap has a wide range of applications. It is indispensable for locksmith, assembly, and construction work where precision and striking force are key. It can be used for nail placement, shaping metal, or even tasks involving bending. Due to the diversity of its uses, this hammer is an ideal tool for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who value effectiveness and reliability with every strike.


Product Characteristics:



  • Well-made head from high-quality high-carbon steel

  • Ergonomic wooden handle for enhanced strike control

  • Comfortable and secure grip

  • Technical Specifications:

  • Weight: 800g

  • Head Material: High-carbon steel

  • Handle Material: Wood

  • Type: Engineer's hammer

description.name: Metal pipe clamp with rubber 3/8" 15-19mm
description.long_desc:
Double metal clamp with rubber is designed for securing pipes in water, sewage, heating, or gas installations. It provides stability, protects the pipes, and minimizes the impact of vibrations on the entire system.


The clamp's design allows for simultaneous fastening of two parallel pipes, which can be useful in situations where it is necessary to mount them side by side.


The clamp is equipped with screws that allow adjustment and secure fastening of the clamp to the appropriate diameter of the pipe.


The clamp is intended for pipes with a diameter of 3/8", corresponding to a range from 15 mm to 19 mm.


The set includes a double-threaded screw and an expansion plug.

description.name: Wood cutting blade 125mm
description.long_desc:
Wood cutting blade. Made of Mn65 manganese steel alloy with high resistance to temperature and deformation. Teeth with carbide tips allow for rough cutting of wood and wood-based materials.


The 125mm blade is designed for use in saws and wall chasers with an additional protective guard.


For safety reasons, the disc cannot be used on angle grinders unless the angle grinder has a special protective cover

description.name: 4pcs color permanent marker set
description.long_desc:
A set of permanent construction markers in a mix of colors with a line thickness of 1.0-1.5 mm, packed in blister packaging. The markers are designed for labeling various construction materials, pipes, electrical installations, and for creating clear markings on structural elements.


Mix of Colors


The set includes markers in four different colors - black, red, green, and blue. This allows users to diversify their markings, facilitating the identification of different elements.


Line Thickness


The markers have tips with a line thickness of 1.0-1.5 mm, enabling precise writing and drawing, as well as marking even smaller details.


Permanent Action


The marker uses ink with a permanent formula, meaning that inscriptions and markings are resistant to water, atmospheric conditions, and other external factors. This ensures their durability and longevity.


Set of 4


The product is delivered in a set of four markers, allowing for the use of different colors in a single project or facilitating collaboration within a team.

Permanent ink - the marker is equipped with ink featuring a lasting formula, meaning that inscriptions and markings are resistant to water, weather conditions, and other external factors, making them durable and long-lasting.


This marker is ideal for labeling various construction materials, pipes, electrical installations, and for creating lasting markings on structural elements.


24 pieces in a display carton - the product is available in a bulk package, facilitating storage and organization. The display carton with 24 markers is also a practical solution for stores and retail points.

description.name: Electrode holder 600A
description.long_desc:
The 600A 5mm BMC welding handle is specially designed for welding using 5mm diameter electrodes, providing the appropriate electrical conductivity and durability in challenging welding conditions.


The handle is made of a plastic material reinforced with fiberglass. BMC (Bulk Molding Compound) is strong, resistant to high temperatures, and corrosion, making it suitable for welding handles that need to operate in tough conditions. Additionally, the BMC material serves as insulation, protecting the welder from electrical conductivity and heat.
